https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bo9dbRo80eHqrYgmd4eV2pbGgec.jpg Rabbit and Rongo, two dumb but kind-hearted criminals, want to help a young girl get the medical treatment she needs. Inspired by true crimes around the world, they attempt to raise money through a series of dumb plans and hopeless schemes. Dumb Criminals: The Movie
